data.comment: The big names in today's match at Versluys Arena have now been confirmed.
The match is underway. Anderlecht have kicked-off.
In the minute 11, Robbie D'Haese puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
Maxime D'Arpino (Oostende) has received a first yellow card.
The away team have replaced Elias Cobbaut with Killian Sardella. This is the first substitution made today by Vincent Kompany.
An attacking Oostende player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
In the minute 34, Marco Kana is booked for the away team.
Goal! Makhtar Gueye extends Oostende's lead from the spot. They now lead 2-0.
In the minute 35, Anderlecht are back in the match in Ostend. Adrien Trebel has scored to make it 2-1.
Michael Murillo (Anderlecht) gets a yellow card.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway. Oostende with the kick-off.
Anderlecht make their second substitution with Lukas Nmecha replacing Antoine Colassin.
Percy Tau levels the score at 2-2.
In the minute 55, The home team replace Fashion Sakala with Indy Boonen.
Arthur Theate (Oostende) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Anderlecht's Adrien Trebel has been booked in Ostend.
In the minute 61, Theo Ndicka is replacing Ari Skulason for the home team.
Cameron McGeehan (Oostende) has received a yellow card from Jan Boterberg.
Marko Kvasina is on a sub for Makhtar Gueye for Oostende.
In the minute 89, Nany Dimata is on a sub for Percy Tau for Anderlecht.
Jan Boterberg blows to end the match. The final score is 2-2.
